product_name: Craft Active Bike Siberian Jacket - Men's
long_description: If you're not put off by biking in arctic temperatures, you must be wearing the Active Bike Siberian men's jacket. Brushed interior keeps you warm and comfortable, and the shell resists wind and rain. Polyester/spandex fabric offers just the right amount of stretch. Warm brushed fleece inside jacket and collar retains heat and breathes well to keep you dry. Windflap behind zipper helps block chilly winds; zipper garage. Zippered back pocket stows booties, etc. Silicone-printed gripper hem keeps the jacket in place. Craft Active Bike Siberian jacket for men features reflective tape for enhanced visibility in low light.
short_description: If you're not put off by biking in arctic temperatures, you must be wearing the Active Bike Siberian men's jacket. Brushed interior keeps you warm and comfortable, and the shell resists wind and rain.
